original_title: Demônios da Garoa: Vem Cantar Comigo
overview: Special concert celebrating the 69-year career of the samba group Demônios da Garoa (Drizzle Daemons). Launched in 2012, the DVD has 24 tracks with the greatest hits of the group, like: Mulher Rendeira, Iracema, Saudosa Maloca, Trem Das Onze, and many others. Special appearances by Péricles, Wando, Dudu Nobre and Arnaldo Antunes.
title: Demônios da Garoa: Vem Cantar Comigo
